title: Self-Mystery Gifting and Worlds Bonus
body: Does the Worlds bonus for Legendary Skins get applied if I buy a Mystery Chest for myself?

replies.body: The messaging is a bonus chance for legendary and esports loot if you open a mystery gift.  It wasn't a mystery chest.  Sorry for any confusion!
Can you point me to a FAQ or Support Article with a comprehensive explanation and all the details, please?

I don't believe mystery chests (self-gifting) are currently enabled, but if they were then yes it would receive the bonus.  Currently mystery gifting is available, though.  Let me know if you have any questions, or if I missed something!
Hum, there was 2 Baron steals yesterday, so why wouldn't they be available? There was even a head-line displayed on the stream re-broadcast this afternoon.
